newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue where jump clones in clone vat bays were not recognized correctly causing character info not to be fully displayed. * Fixed an issue where jump clone names after the first were not immutable in Implants window. * Fixed an crash bug when removing implant sets. * Fixed a visual issue when using large fonts in character header info section.
== Enhancements ==
* Added bonus for the Advanced Infomorph Psychology skill. * Added bonus for the Infomorph Synchronizing skill. * Added info on how to delete a custom set row in Implants window.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
